title: Hayden Christensen and Rachel Bilson reunite for daughter's 5th birthday at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge
text:
Star Wars alum Hayden Christensen checked out the Millennium Falcon at the new Galaxy's Edge attraction at Disneyland Park on Tuesday in honor of his daughter Briar Rose's 5th birthday.

The Canadian 38-year-old - who played Anakin Skywalker - sweetly built his future Jedi her very own custom blue light saber at Savi's Workshop inside the Anaheim theme park.

Hayden's ex-fiancée Rachel Bilson was also there, posting a cheery snap of little Briar (named after Sleeping Beauty) skipping along in her custom monogrammed Mickey birthday cap.

Family fun day! Star Wars alum Hayden Christensen checked out the Millennium Falcon at the new Galaxy's Edge attraction at Disneyland Park on Tuesday in honor of his daughter Briar Rose's 5th birthday

Sweet! The Canadian 38-year-old - who played Anakin Skywalker - built his future Jedi her very own custom blue light saber at Savi's Workshop inside the Anaheim theme park

'This is 5!' the 38-year-old LA native gushed on Instagram. 'Happy Birthday to my entire universe.'

The Golden Globe nominee and The O.C. alum officially ended their decade-long on/off romance (and 18-month engagement) in September 2017.

Christensen and Bilson met playing love interests in Doug Liman's caper Jumper and they went on to co-star in the 2009 rom-com anthology New York, I Love You as well as Sarik Andreasyan's 2014 drama American Heist.

Christensen - who also stepped inside the Smugglers Run ride - seemed to fuel rumors that he'll make a cameo in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker hitting US theaters on December 20.

'Happy Birthday to my entire universe!' Hayden's ex-fiancée Rachel Bilson was also there, posting a cheery snap of little Briar (named after Sleeping Beauty) skipping along in her custom monogrammed Mickey birthday cap

Amicable exes: The O.C. alum and The Golden Globe nominee ended their decade-long on/off romance - and 18-month engagement - in 2017 (pictured July 21)

Met on set: Christensen and Bilson met playing love interests in Doug Liman's caper Jumper (pictured in 2007) and they went on to co-star in the 2009 rom-com anthology New York, I Love You as well as Sarik Andreasyan's 2014 drama American Heist

Inside Smugglers Run: Christensen seemed to fuel rumors that he'll make a cameo in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker hitting US theaters on December 20

'Hayden is said to have filmed his scenes last year,' an insider told Showbiz 411 earlier this month.

'The word is the grandfather of evil Kylo Ren (Adam Driver) will appear as a Force Ghost, just as Yoda returned in The Last Jedi.'

Back in the early 2000s, critics and fans were none too kind about the 'wooden' chemistry between the Cannes Chopard winner and Natalie Portman in the disappointing prequel trilogy.

Christensen famously beat out Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonathan Jackson, and 400 other candidates for the role of Anakin, who went from young Jedi to surly Sith lord Darth Vader.

An insider told Showbiz 411 earlier this month: 'Hayden is said to have filmed his scenes last year. The word is the grandfather of evil Kylo Ren (Adam Driver) will appear as a Force Ghost'

Judged too harshly? Back in the early 2000s, critics and fans were none too kind about the 'wooden' chemistry between the Cannes Chopard winner and Natalie Portman (R) in the disappointing prequel trilogy
description: The Canadian 38-year-old is rumored to reprise his role as the Force Ghost version of Anakin Skywalker in Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker
